name: dvc
description: Machine learning experiment management with tracking, plots, and data versioning.

untrustedWorkspaces.description: This extension depends on the vscode.git extension, which is disabled in Restricted Mode.

colors.description: Color to indicate a DVC dep column in the experiments table
Color to indicate a DVC metric column in the experiments table
Color to indicate a DVC param column in the experiments table
Color used in the experiments table to highlight a value in the workspace that differs from the latest committed value

commands.title: Add Or Update Sort On Experiments Table
Stop Processing Queued Experiments Gracefully (Complete Running)
Remove All Filters from Experiments Table
Remove All Sorts from Experiments Table
Select Experiments to Display in Plots
Select Columns to Display in the Experiments Table
Select Columns to Display First in the Experiments Table
Reset Persisted State and Reload Window

dvc.doNotInformMaxExperimentsPlotted.description: Do not inform when plotting more experiments is blocked (maximum number selected).

dvc.doNotRecommendRedHatExtension.description: Do not prompt to install the Red Hat YAML extension, which helps with DVC YAML schema validation.

dvc.doNotRecommendMermaidSupportExtensio.description: Do not prompt to install the Markdown Preview Mermaid Support extension, which helps to visualize DVC pipeline DAGs

dvc.doNotRecommendAddStudioToken.description: Do not prompt to add a studio.token to the global DVC config, which enables automatic sharing of experiments to Studio.

dvc.doNotShowCliUnavailable.description: Do not warn when the workspace contains a DVC project but the DVC binary is unavailable.

dvc.doNotShowSetupAfterInstall.description: Do not prompt to show the setup page after installing. Useful for pre-configured development environments.

dvc.dvcPath.description: Path or shell command to the DVC binary. Required unless Microsoft's Python extension is installed and the `dvc` package found in its environment.

dvc.experimentsTableHeadMaxHeight.description: Maximum height of Experiment table head rows. Use 0 for infinite height.

dvc.focusedProjects.description: A subset of paths to the workspace's available DVC projects. Using this option will override project auto-discovery. Only absolute paths inside of the workspace will be included. All other DVC projects in the workspace will be ignored.

dvc.pythonPath.description: Path to the desired Python interpreter to use with DVC. Required when using a virtual environment. Overrides any other extension's settings for this extension's purposes.

scm/resourceState/context.when: scmProvider == dvc && scmResourceGroup == uncommitted && scmResourceState != uncommittedUnknown && scmResourceState != notInCache && dvc.commands.available && !dvc.scm.command.running

viewsWelcome.contents:
[$(beaker) Show Experiments](command:dvc.showExperiments)
[$(graph-scatter) Show Plots](command:dvc.showPlots)
[$(play) Run Experiment](command:dvc.runExperiment)

The extension is currently unable to initialize.
[Show Setup](command:dvc.showDvcSetup)
New to the extension? Watch a [demo of the extension](https://youtu.be/E26IaD7bNXg?t=1177) in action or quickly try the extension yourself with our [example project](https://github.com/iterative/example-get-started-experiments). Dive deeper into DVC at [dvc.org](https://dvc.org/).
No Plots or Data to Display.

walkthroughs.title: Get Started
walkthroughs.description: Your first steps to build better models faster with experiment tracking and dataset versioning

steps.title: Setup
steps.description:
Get started with DVC or setup additonal features.
[Show Setup](command:dvc.showSetup)

steps.title: Control from the Side Bar
steps.description:
Use rich views to quickly access, control, or overview your experiments and plots.
[Show Views](command:workbench.view.extension.dvc-views)

steps.title: Experiments Table
steps.description:
Displays your experiments in a customizable table.
[Show Table](command:dvc.showExperiments)

steps.title: Running Experiments
steps.description:
Explore a few ways you can run or queue a new experiment.
[Run an Experiment](command:dvc.modifyWorkspaceParamsAndRun)

steps.title: Plots Dashboard
steps.description:
Visualize and compare multiple experiments with interactive customizable charts.
[Show Plots](command:dvc.showPlots)

steps.title: Live Plot Updates
steps.description:
Run experiments and track how metrics and plots change in the same plots dashboard.
[Show Plots](command:dvc.showPlots)

steps.title: Data and Model Management
steps.description:
Navigate and manage datasets, models, and any large files that are tracked by DVC.
[Show Tracked](command:dvc.views.trackedExplorerTree.focus)

steps.title: More Resources
steps.description:
Learn more about this extension and DVC, and find other relevant materials.
[DVC Docs](https://dvc.org/doc)

steps.title: Troubleshoot & Support
steps.description:
We are here to help! Ping us and provide the DVC output channel logs.
[View Output](command:dvc.showOutput)
